entries.journal_entry_description: The holding cell where the Wookiee who have undergone the medical procedures aboard the Avatar is locked. A security card from a Blackscale jailer will be needed to open it.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You will need to get a passkey from a Trandoshan jailer in this section of the building in order to access this cell.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Use the jailer's ID card to open up the cells that contain the Wookiees who have under gone medical treatment.
